attributes.action: Change the way politics is run in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Because evidence shows that each government over the last 50 years cannot run this country
attributes.background: I want government/parliament to debate that the current structure does not support the best interest of our people. So reform needs action and a new structure put in place and house of commons and Lords is scapped

rejection.details: We understand that you are concerned about the way politics is currently run, but we don't know what system you'd like to replace it.
